title: AI plays expanding role in predicting natural disasters
description: Artificial intelligence is gradually enabling more accurate forecasts of storms, fires and other events.
content:
On July 8, 2024, Hurricane Beryl made landfall near Matagorda, Texas, at around 4 a.m. Central Daylight Time.
The storm had ripped through parts of the Caribbean and the Yucatán Peninsula before reaching the U.S. Gulf Coast 2 hours southwest of Houst... [4820 chars]

title: Ex-Twitter CEO Agrawal's AI search startup Parallel raises $100 million
description: (Reuters) -AI startup Parallel Web Systems, founded by former Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal, has raised $100 million to build web search infrastructure for artificial intelligence agents and fund deals with online content owners, Agrawal said in an interview.

title: Baltimore County student detained over chips raises doubts on AI detection reliability
description: Video of a Baltimore County student being detained by police for having a bag of chips, is raising questions about the effectiveness of Artificial Intelligence.
content: Video of a Baltimore County student being detained by police for having a bag of chips, is raising questions about the effectiveness of Artificial Intelligence software to detect weapons. These systems cost taxpayers millions of dollars. But are they... [3792 chars]

title: Tencent’s $280 Billion Rally May Extend as Games Boost Earnings
description: As fears grow over concentration in technology stocks amid a possible bubble in the artificial intelligence trade, investors are piling into Tencent Holdings Ltd. shares as a safer bet.
content:

title: JU students secure runner-up position at State level Hackathon
description: Excelsior Sports Correspondent JAMMU, Nov 12: Students from the University of Jammu’s “Design Your Degree” (DYD) B.Tech programme in Artificial Intelligence & Mathematical Innovations have secured the runner-up position at a State level Hackathon organized by Islamic University of Science & Technology (IUST), Awantipora. The winning seven member team consisted of Adil Mahajan, Tavishi Amla, Pawandeep Singh, Bhoomi Samnotra, Avichal Badyal, Gourav Sharma and Suhani Behl. They were guided and mentored by Mohsin Hassan from the University’s faculty. A felicitation […]
content:
